name: Harness Magicka
description: Convert a portion of your Magicka into a protective ward, gaining a damage shield that absorbs 3718 damage for 6 seconds. Damage shield strength capped at 50% of your Max Health.  While active, whenever the shield absorbs damage, you restore 229 Magicka. Each piece of Light Armor worn increases the Magicka restored by 33%.  This effect can occur up to 3 times.
descHeader: Requires 5 pieces of light armor equipped
effectLines: Restores Magicka whenever you absorb damage.
coefDescription: Requires 5 pieces of light armor equipped Convert a portion of your Magicka into a protective ward, gaining a damage shield that absorbs $1 damage for 6 seconds. Damage shield strength capped at 50% of your Max Health.  While active, whenever the shield absorbs damage, you restore 229 Magicka. Each piece of Light Armor worn increases the Magicka restored by 33%.  This effect can occur up to 3 times.
